title: Estimates for smooth Weyl sums on minor arcs
authors: Joerg Bruedern and Trevor D. Wooley
abstract:
We provide new estimates for smooth Weyl sums on minor arcs and explore their
consequences for the distribution of the fractional parts of $\alpha n^k$. In
particular, when $k\ge 6$ and $\rho(k)$ is defined via the relation
$\rho(k)^{-1}=k(\log k+8.02113)$, then for all large numbers $N$ there is an
integer $n$ with $1\le n\le N$ for which $\| \alpha n^k\|\le N^{-\rho(k)}$.
